attributes.action: Fully legalising cannabis for medical and recreational
attributes.additional_details:
We are way behind other countries with legislation of cannabis, the United States is about to have its 11th state legal to smoke and buy cannabis, we also have Canada and Australia that have fully legal cannabis, so why are we so behind?

Cannabis ain’t bad here why?

- Deaths 0
- overdoses 0
- Helped million’s
- The gov will make tons of money 

Why cannabis is bad?

- ... idk there is nothing except just makes you really hungry 😂
attributes.background: I thinks it’s about time that the people of the UK want to legally sit back and smoke without being paranoid about the police showing up at there door and charging you. It’s time to take action and make cannabis legal for everyone.
